entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon.
